name: Men's Tailored Shorts
description: These tailored shorts are crafted from high-quality fabric for a comfortable fit. Ideal for both casual and semi-formal occasions, they feature a classic design with a single button closure and belt loops

name: Men's Polo Shirt
description: A classic men's polo shirt made from breathable cotton, perfect for everyday wear. This shirt features a three-button placket and a comfortable fit, making it a versatile addition to any wardrobe

name: Men's Drawstring Shorts
description: Comfortable and stylish, these drawstring shorts are perfect for casual outings. Made from lightweight fabric, they offer a relaxed fit and feature an adjustable waistband for added comfort

name: Men's Crew Neck T-Shirt
description: A staple for any wardrobe, this men's crew neck t-shirt is made from soft, high-quality cotton. It offers a classic fit and is available in multiple colors to suit any style

name: Men's Button-Up Shirt (Dark Grey)
description: This versatile button-up shirt is perfect for both casual and formal settings. Made from premium cotton, it features a chest pocket and buttoned cuffs for a polished look

name: Men's Button-Up Shirt (Beige)
description: A stylish beige button-up shirt suitable for various occasions. Crafted from soft, durable fabric, it offers a comfortable fit and features a classic collar and front pocket.

name: Men's Performance T-Shirt
description: Designed for active lifestyles, this performance t-shirt is made from moisture-wicking fabric to keep you cool and dry. It offers a comfortable fit and is perfect for workouts or casual wear.

name: Men's Drawstring Shorts with Patch
description: These men's drawstring shorts feature a unique patch design and are made from comfortable fabric. They offer a relaxed fit and an adjustable waistband, perfect for casual wear

name: Men's Light Wash Jeans
description: These light wash jeans offer a modern look with a slim fit. Made from durable denim, they are perfect for both casual and semi-formal occasions.

name: Men's Dark Blue Jeans
description: A pair of dark blue jeans with a classic fit. These jeans are versatile and can be paired with a variety of outfits for different occasions.

name: Men's Chino Pants (Camel)
description: These camel-colored chino pants are made from high-quality fabric, offering comfort and style. They are ideal for both casual and business casual settings.

name: Men's Jogger Pants (Blue)
description: These blue jogger pants are perfect for a relaxed and sporty look. They feature an elastic waistband and cuffs for a comfortable fit.

name: Men's White Polo Shirt
description: A classic white polo shirt made from breathable cotton. This shirt is perfect for everyday wear and can be dressed up or down.

name: Women's Tailored Shorts (Cream)
description: These tailored shorts in cream are perfect for a polished summer look. Made from high-quality fabric

name: Women's Wrap Skirt
description: A chic and versatile wrap skirt in black

name: Women's High-Waisted Trousers
description: These high-waisted trousers in brown are designed for both comfort and style. Featuring large front pockets and a tailored fit

name: Women's Wide-Leg Pants (Green)
description: Make a statement with these vibrant green wide-leg pants. Designed for a relaxed fit

name: Women's Floral Print Pants
description: These floral print pants offer a fun and stylish look. The black and white floral design adds a touch of elegance

name: Women's Navy Flared Trousers
description: A pair of classic navy flared trousers that provide a sophisticated look. These trousers are perfect for professional settings or evening events

name: Women's Sleeveless Top (Olive)
description: This olive sleeveless top is perfect for warm weather. It features a V-neck with tie detail at the back and a peplum hem

name: Women's White Button-Up Shirt
description: A classic white button-up shirt

name: Women's Short-Sleeve Blouse
description: This elegant short-sleeve blouse in a soft beige hue is ideal for warm weather. It features a traditional collar and button-down front

name: Women's Floral Print Tank Top
description: A stylish floral print tank top

name: Women's Printed Blouse
description: This printed blouse features a unique black and brown pattern. With its relaxed fit and half sleeves

name: Women's Green Tank Top
description: A vibrant green tank top
